mapper.update:
update od_order_execution_plan
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
act_partnerid = #{actPartnerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
act_operator = #{actOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
complete_time = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

upt_operator = #{uptOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upt_time = #{uptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update od_order_execution_plan set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, act_partnerid = #{actPartnerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, act_operator = #{actOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, complete_time = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, action_content = #{actionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_operator = #{createOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upt_operator = #{uptOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upt_time = #{uptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select p.order_id,p.server_id ,s.server_name from od_order_execution_plan p join sys_server_type s on p.server_id=s.id where is_del=0
and p.order_id in
#{item}
group by p.order_id,p.server_id

SELECT w.id,e.id plan_id,e.order_id,w.work_name,e.status,e.sort,e.act_operator,e.complete_time,e.server_id FROM od_order o,od_order_execution_plan e,sys_worktype w WHERE o.id = e.order_id AND w.id=e.work_id AND o.customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND e.status = 3 order by e.create_time limit 1
